data.name: 王子斗恶龙(The prince fights the Dragon)
data.detailed_description: This is a game of the prince fighting the dragon. In order to save the refugees, the prince of the King City picked up his weapons and bravely went to the Dragon Cave to fight the Dragon death. The prince knocked down countless demons with the magic given to him by the spirit of the earth. The people forged weapons for him to make him add bricks and tiles. The people gave him strength to make him not afraid to move forward. What did the prince do for the people of the Kingdom and the dragon. We come to the world of the King City, where the prince grew up. Modern people have a fast pace. We immerse ourselves in a new world and experience new feelings. I set the people here very well, like heaven. In this new world, we can fight against demons, make profits and give money a role. They will happily give us what we want. The reason why the hero is a prince is that we want to be noble people. When the prince plays in this world, he will see many interesting things. As for why I made this game, I hope players can answer it by themselves. If you insist on knowing the content, I can tell you sincerely. First of all, this is an adventure game. I built a kingdom continent to adventure here. The kingdom is divided into two floors, between the royal palaces and the hall. The kingdom is full of soldiers and ministers. The place here is very wide. You can talk to them and get any information. After talking with them, you can enter the main line. The whole continent is divided into three parts. They are the starting place of the game in the middle, the western town, and the last military important place. Each map has corresponding supplies. We have made full logistical support in the town. Here you can buy weapons, armor, sundries and blood return. This is a system for fighting monsters. Buy props according to the basic value, and the prince's power will change. Because of the strange play in the game. We require the game to be divided into four props to change the basic value: combat weapon, armor, armor and helmet. Monster the whole game is divided into three kinds, each has its own merits. His ability can change himself or herself. We can specify different playing methods for monsters. You can use purchased weapons and rich spell system in battle, which is tailored for the prince. A rich spell system can take the game to a higher level. This is rare. We have greatly improved the defect that turn based games can only attack. Give players more room to fight. Magic can diversify the attack, change its ability value like the other party, and stabilize HP. The game is pushed through the keyboard. The plot is very simple, but it is definitely different. I can also find precious items through map exploration. You can buy blood returning medicine in the town. W up a left s Down D right 1 enter the menu ,enter confirm ,the backspace exit.In case of Trojan horse interception, please set the program to trust

data.short_description: This is an adventure game. You can use moves, spells and weapons. This game will bring you happiness.
data.supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy 王子斗恶龙(The prince fights the Dragon)
